text: P Cygni is a blue supergiant star located in the constellation Cygnus. It is 76 times larger than the Sun and 30 times more massive. P Cygni is a luminous blue variable (or LBV for short) star, maybe even the first one discovered. == Related pages == * WR 102ka * LBV 1806-20 ==References== Category:Supergiants Category:Hypergiants Category:Variable stars
title: P Cygni
